data.title: Local Theatre
data.text: Decided last minute to go see a performance. Didn't take printed tickets but theatre manager honored our e tickets from my smart phone. He was so friendly and helpful. Great venue, any seat is a good seat. Beverages and snacks are available on site. Really enjoyed the intimate and casual setting. Good to know such a great little venue is nearby.

data.title: Hawaiian music at it's best
data.text: The Aloha Concert Series at Whittier College in Whittier,CA has been going for 23 years. Major island performers have played this venue of five Hawaiian music concerts a season. The last concert(Oct. 3, 2015) starred Weldon Kekauoha, with the Kupaoa, Mark Yamanaka,The Makaha Sons, Herb Ohta,Jr, Brian Tolentino and the Brothers Cazimero scheduled for later concerts.The Saturday concerts are at 2 and 7:30 with a free one hour patio concert of new performers prior to each concert. Three hours of great Hawaiian music.
